details.title: Better Inventory
items: Add Trap Sorting option under Experimental Settings

details.title: Better Journal
items: Updated text replacements and styles

details.title: Better Maps
items: Added ability to pin environments in the Scroll Shop
Added links to MHCT and Tsitu's map solvers in the footer
Added quantity and chance percent to items in the Preview
Added toggle buttons to completed Maps Goals sections, Ctrl/Cmd-click to toggle all
Fixed fallback to Relic Hunter hints when API does not return location
Fixed issue with hunters who have left the map not being able to be invited again
Fixed sidebar toggle functionality not working correctly sometimes
Updated display of chest and aura icons, moved them to near the map name
Added 'Show map solver links' option
Added area highlighting to Warpath maps

details.title: Better Mice
items: Updated King's Crowns caching
Updated styles

details.title: Better Travel
items: Removed 'Show friend and hunter counts on map' option

details.title: Better Shops
items: Updated styles for Big Jaq

details.title: Better UI
items: Added Egg Master icon display to profile pages

details.title: Custom Shield
items: Added 17th Birthday shield

details.title: Dark Mode
items: Updated styles

details.title: Fixes
items: Updated Passing Parcel fixes to be more performant
Fixed Burroughs Rift Location riftiago quantities not showing correctly

details.title: Journal Changer
items: Add Draconic Depths to the environment list

details.title: Show Auras
items: Updated styles

items: Updated styles

items: Added reminders when trap power type does not match charm

details.title: Quick Send Supplies
items: Fixed issues where multiple popups would show and not correctly close

items: Added Relic Hunter chests
